Ok so you willfully/knowingly broke the rules and are trying to 
justify it? Right... And so when did you get authority to control 
other bases and sneak onto islands that could have detected stuff? 
And Im hoping you asked the council about the optimal thing...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> I'll admit I broke the rules, but something is misunderstood about 
my 
> post in a vast amount. I did not bring down the shields, they were 
> brought down when the "Iron Fist" fired the main turret twice from 
> the power loss.
